plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PIN code. You have %d remaining attempts before you must enter your PUK code (PIN unlock code) or contact your service provider to unlock your device.
Incorrect SIM PIN code. You have %d remaining attempt before you must enter your PUK code (PIN unlock code) or contact your service provider to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d attempts remaining before your SIM becomes permanently unusable.
Incorrect SIM PUK code, you have %d attempt remaining before your SIM becomes permanently unusable.

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_pattern
plurals.item: "Device hasn't been unlocked for %d hours. Confirm pattern."
"Device hasn't been unlocked for %d hour. Confirm pattern."
